channel.title: How do i change the home
channel.description: i wanted to know how i changes your home im using my base as spades-scape and i rite now my home is lumbrige how do i make it varack or fallador

item.title: How do i change the home
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

I told you already how to find your co-ordinates… Search your current starting position when you log-in. Those are your starting co-ordinates, search those co-ordinates and change them to the desired co-ordinates you want.

Read full topic

 removePlayer(players[i]);

                players[i].initialize();
                players[i].initialized = true;

item.title: How do i change the home
item.dc:creator: @djvawter djvawter
item.description:
@djvawter wrote:

if you just want to change where you first start out, go to playerhandler.java and search “initial” and it should say initial coordinates of player…blah blah, just change that to where ever you want it to be. you will need to know the coordanants of the place that you want to make home. also, it has 2 coordinates for each x and y, those are the range for which they spawn. so for example, 1000//1005, they can randomly spawn anywhere from 1000 coordinate to 1005 coordinate…pm me for more help

Read full topic
